articles.description: Watch international women's rugby and listen live as Australia host Wales in the first of two Tests this summer.
articles.title: Women's rugby: Australia vs Wales - watch, listen & follow live text

articles.description: The race is on for Joe Root to catch Sachin Tendulkar as Test cricket's most prolific batter, writes Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: Sachin Tendulkar's record: Joe Root has Little Master in his sights

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions go into the second Test as strong favourites - can a powered-up Australia deny them a series-winning 2-0 lead at the cavernous MCG?
articles.title: British and Irish Lions v Australia at MCG: Tourists aim to take 2-0 lead in series

articles.description: The biggest sides in the top flight are all at the top of the list for spending in the summer transfer window.
articles.title: Premier League transfers: Major clubs dominate summer spending

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu qualifies for the semi-finals of the Washington Open after beating wildcard Maria Sakkari in straight sets.
articles.title: Washington Open: Emma Raducanu beats Maria Sakkari to reach semi-finals

articles.description: McLaren's Oscar Piastri produces a breathtaking performance to set pole position for the sprint race at the Belgian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix: Oscar Piastri sets dominant pole for sprint

articles.description: Tadej Pogacar is set to win his fourth Tour de France after defending his lead on on stage 19, won by Thymen Arensman after a gruelling ascent to La Plagne.
articles.title: Tour de France 2025 results: Tadej Pogacar set for fourth triumph as Thymen Arensman wins stage 19

articles.description: Australia forward Rob Valetini played in the same age-grade team as the Lions' Sione Tuipulotu. On Saturday, he will attempt to help Australia get back into the series.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Rob Valetini returns to Melbourne with series on the line

articles.description: Ruben Amorim says rival clubs might be in for a "shock" if they think they can sign Manchester United's unwanted players on the cheap this summer.
articles.title: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim says club won't sell unwanted players on the cheap

articles.description: Manager Sarina Wiegman says she "does not know yet" whether England forward Lauren James will be available for Sunday's Euro 2025 final.
articles.title: Lauren James injury: England striker racing against time to be fit for Euro 2025 final
